column1: @entity1 and his @entity0 wanted to make a pizza. On Sunday afternoon, they went to the supermarket to buy the ingredients. At the supermarket, they picked up some pizza dough, sauce, cheese, and pepperoni slices. The next day, @entity1 and his @entity0 started making the pizza. First, @entity1 rolled out the dough. Then, his @entity0 poured the sauce over the dough. Afterwards, @entity1 put the cheese on the pizza Last, @entity1's dad put pepperoni slices on top. "Now, we must put it in the oven", @entity1's @entity0 said. They slid the pizza into the oven and waited for it to finish cooking. After some time, @entity1's @entity0 removed the pizza from the oven. The cheese was bubbly. "It looks great!" @entity1 shouted. After the cheese stopped bubbling, @entity1's @entity0 cut the pizza into eight slices. @entity1 got four slices and @entity1's @entity0 got four slices. They were both happy with how the pizza came out. They both enjoyed eating the pizza very much.
